title: The One with the Jellyfish
synopsis: Ross dates Rachel again after unwittingly agreeing to take responsibility for their breakup. Monica is stung by a jellyfish.

title: The One with the Cat
synopsis: Phoebe believes that the cat that jumped into her guitar case in Central Perk contains the spirit of her adoptive mom.

title: The One with the 'Cuffs
synopsis: Monica tries to prove that she can cater a gourmet meal for her mother. Chandler gets into an embarrassing situation while dating Rachel's boss.

title: The One with the Ballroom Dancing
synopsis: Joey teaches the building superintendent ballroom dancing to prevent him from evicting Rachel and Monica. Phoebe wants to date a massage client.

title: The One with Joey's New Girlfriend
synopsis: Joey thinks that Chandler hates Joey's new girlfriend -- but the truth is that Chandler avoids her because he is so attracted to her.

title: The One with the Dirty Girl
synopsis: Ross's beautiful new girlfriend has a very dirty apartment. Chandler becomes more familiar with Joey's girlfriend.

title: The One Where Chandler Crosses the Line
synopsis: Chandler is guilt-ridden after kissing Joey's girlfriend. Ross's musical talents are not as amazing as he and Phoebe think.

title: The One with Chandler in a Box
synopsis: On Thanksgiving, Joey punishes Chandler for kissing Kathy. Monica gets a surprise when she visits an eye doctor: He's her former boyfriend's son.

title: The One Where They're Going to Party
synopsis: The guys try to be spontaneous and wild. Rachel is offered a promotion. Monica must decide between a job as a head chef or her catering business.

title: The One with the Girl from Poughkeepsie
synopsis: Ross struggles to maintain a long-distance relationship. Chandler tries to get a date for Rachel. Monica plots to establish authority at her new job.

title: The One with Phoebe's Uterus
synopsis: Phoebe's half-brother makes an astounding announcement: He has married his older girlfriend and wants Phoebe to be a surrogate mother for them.

title: The One with the Embryos
synopsis: Phoebe undergoes an embryo transplant and becomes pregnant. A simple challenge escalates into a full-blown contest between the guys and the women.

title: The One with Rachel's Crush
synopsis: Chandler has a hard time with Kathy's new role in a play, in which she pretends to have sex with a handsome man. Rachel is attracted to a customer.

title: The One with Joey's Dirty Day
synopsis: Joey has no time to shower after he comes home from a three-day fishing trip and has to head out to the set of Charlton Heston's new movie.

title: The One with All the Rugby
synopsis: Chandler runs into Janice, now divorced, and finds her more irritating than ever. Ross plays rugby to impress Emily.

title: The One with the Fake Party
synopsis: Rachel throws Emily a phony going-away party so she can see Joshua outside of work. Pregnant Phoebe craves meat.

title: The One with the Free Porn
synopsis: The guys realize their TV is picking up a porno station for free. Phoebe discovers she's carrying triplets.

title: The One with Rachel's New Dress
synopsis: Phoebe gets to name one of her babies. Rachel's plans to seduce her boyfriend go awry. Ross worries about his relationship with Emily.

title: The One with All the Haste
synopsis: Monica and Rachel will do anything to get their old apartment back from the guys. Ross asks Emily to marry him.

title: The One with the Wedding Dresses
synopsis: Monica wears Emily's wedding dress. Chandler forces Joey to get treatment for his snoring at a sleep clinic. Rachel proposes marriage to Joshua.

title: The One with the Invitation
synopsis: Rachel and the engaged Ross reminisce separately about when they dated each other. The friends get invitations to Ross's wedding.

title: The One with the Worst Best Man Ever
synopsis: After Joey almost loses Ross's wedding ring, Ross asks both Joey and Chandler to serve as his best man. The girls host a baby shower for Phoebe.

title: The One with Ross's Wedding: Part 1
synopsis: In London for Ross's wedding, Chandler and Joey argue while sightseeing. After talking with Phoebe, Rachel realizes that she still loves Ross.

title: The One with Ross's Wedding: Part 2
synopsis: Phoebe tries to warn the friends that Rachel is coming to London. Chandler and Monica develop a connection. Ross's father argues with Emily's father.
